questions.text: Does UI Policy runs in browser?
Filter is a set of condition applied to a table list to show as subset of the data?
C++ is the language used for scripting in the ServiceNow?
BR script can run when a record is displayed, inserted, updated, deleted or when a table is queried
Plugins once installed can be uninstalled
User criteria allows you to limit users able to contribute or read knowledge within a knowledge base?
Can we use to map the data into service now tables?
Mask is a set of condition applied to a table list to show as subset of the data?
Client script runs in browser.
Business rule can not run on server side
In ServiceNow, each record in a table has a unique identifier called the 'Sys ID.'
A 'Business Rule' in ServiceNow runs on the client-side (browser).
The 'Service Catalog' in ServiceNow allows end-users to request IT services, software, and hardware.
In ServiceNow, Incident module is used for tracking non-IT related issues, such as HR inquiries.
A 'Service Level Agreement' (SLA) in ServiceNow defines the expected level of service and can trigger actions based
In ServiceNow, users cannot modify their own roles and permissions.
The 'Dictionary' in ServiceNow defines how fields and tables are structured.
In ServiceNow, a 'Business Rule' can be used to validate data before it is saved to the database.
The 'Form Layout' in ServiceNow allows administrators to define the fields visible on a record form.
The 'Application Navigator' in ServiceNow allows users to quickly search for and access various modules and record
When a Flow runs an action, it generates a runtime value, which stays the same for the duration of the flow. What is the name of that runtime value?
Which resource would you use to determine if a specific user could contribute to a particular knowledge base?
What access does a user need to be able to import articles to a knowledge base?
What section on a task record would you use to see the most recent update made to a record?
What controls the publishing and retiring process for knowledge articles?
What is an advantage of defining relationship types between CI classes?
options: A. It prevents users from relating CIs incorrectly
B. It automates the loading of the CIs dependency view
C. Improves data quality, as the CIs will automatically be related when CMDB is activated
D. Makes relating CIs easier, because predefined relationship suggests which type of CIs should be
questions.correctAnswer: B. It automates the loading of the CIs dependency view

questions.text: When using the CI dependency view, how would you view the relationship between one CI and another CI?
options: B. Click on the plus to expand cluster
D. Click down arrow, view relationship

questions.text: Of the CI tables, which is a base table of the CMDB hierarchy?
What table acts as a staging area for records imported from a data source?
Which field(s) is used as a unique key during imports?
What module enables an administrator to define destinations for imported data on any ServiceNow table?
Which component of a table contains a piece of data for one record?
What do you click when you have made modifications to your report, and you want to see the results without saving?
The report designer contains different sections for configuring your report. Which section is used to specify grouping and calculations to be run against the data?
What section on the notes tab shows the history of the work documented on the record?
What type of rules specify which user groups are responsible to work on different types of tasks?
Using the module, system properties > my company. What branding options are available?
options: A. Banner image, Banner text, Colour scheme
D. Company name, Company logo, Colour scheme

questions.text: From form designer, how would you define a section, so it displays as a tab?
options: A. Click context menu > configure tabs
B. Click the gear and check the tab option
C. Add '_tab' to the end of the section name

questions.text: What is the best way to learn about performance analytics?
options: B. Schedule a demo with ServiceNow sales team
C. Take a ServiceNow performance analytics course on Now Learning
D. Activate the plugin on your production environment and start the default data collectors
questions.correctAnswer: C. Take a ServiceNow performance analytics course on Now Learning

questions.text: What are the types of business rules?
A Service Catalog may include which of the following components?
options: A. Order Guides, Exchange Rates, Calendars
B. Order Guides, Catalog Items, Interceptors
C. Catalog Items, Asset Contracts, Task Surveys
D. Catalog Items, Asset Contracts, Task SLAs
questions.correctAnswer: C. Catalog Items, Asset Contracts, Task Surveys

questions.text: Which one of the following statements applies to a set of fields when they are coalesced during an import?
options: A. If a match is found using the coalesce fields, the existing record is updated with the information being imported
B. If a match is not found using the coalesce fields, the system does not create a transform map
C. If a match is found using the coalesce fields, the system creates a new record
D. If a match is not found using the coalesce fields, the existing record is updated with the information being imported
questions.correctAnswer: A. If a match is found using the coalesce fields, the existing record is updated with the information being imported

questions.text: As it relates to ServiceNow reporting, which of the following statements describes what a metric can do?
options: A. A metric is a report gauge used on homepages to display real-time data
B. A metric is a time measurement used to report the effectiveness of workflows and SLAs
C. A metric is used to measure and evaluate the effectiveness of IT service management processes
D. A metric is a comparative measurement used to report the effectiveness of flows and SLAs
questions.correctAnswer: C. A metric is used to measure and evaluate the effectiveness of IT service management processes

questions.text: The display sequence is controlled in a Service Catalog item using which of the following?
options: A. The Default Value field in the Catalog Item form
B. The Sequence filed in the Catalog Item form
C. The Order field in the Variable form
D. The Choice field in the Variable form
questions.correctAnswer: D. The Choice field in the Variable form

questions.text: What is the path an Administrator could take to view the fulfillment stage task list for an order placed by a user?
Which term refers to application menus and modules which you may want to access quickly and often?
What is generated from the Service Catalog once a user places an order for an item or service?
Which one of the following statements applies to a set of fields when they are coalesced during an import?
options: A. If a match is found using the coalesce fields, the existing record is updated with the information being imported
B. If a match is not found using the coalesce fields, the system does not create a transform map
C. If a match is found using the coalesce fields, the system creates a new record
D. If a match is not found using the coalesce fields, the existing record is updated with the information being imported
questions.correctAnswer: A. If a match is found using the coalesce fields, the existing record is updated with the information being imported

questions.text: As it relates to ServiceNow reporting, which of the following statements describes what a metric can do?
options: A. A metric is a report gauge used on homepages to display real-time data
B. A metric is a time measurement used to report the effectiveness of flows and SLAs
C. A metric is used to measure and evaluate the effectiveness of IT service management processes
D. A metric is a comparative measurement used to report the effectiveness of flows and SLAs
questions.correctAnswer: C. A metric is used to measure and evaluate the effectiveness of IT service management processes

questions.text: The display sequence is controlled in a Service Catalog item using which of the following?
options: A. The Default Value field in the Catalog Item form
B. The Sequence field in the Catalog item form
C. The Order field in the Variable form
D. The Choice field in the Variable form
questions.correctAnswer: C. The Order field in the Variable form

questions.text: Which term refers to application menus and modules which you may want to access quickly and often?
What is generated from the Service Catalog once a user places an order for an item or service?
Which of the following is used to initiate a flow?
For administrators creating new Service Catalog items, what is a characteristic they should know about Service Catalog variables?
options: A. Service Catalog variables can only be used in Record Producers
B. Service Catalog variables can only be used in Order Guides
C. Service Catalog variables cannot affect the order price
D. Service Catalog variables are global by default
questions.correctAnswer: D. Service Catalog variables are global by default

questions.text: Which one of the following statements is true about Column Context Menus?
options: A. It displays actions such as creating quick reports, configuring the list, and exporting data
B. It displays actions related to filtering options,assigning tags, and search
C. It displays actions related to viewing and filtering the entire list
D. It displays actions such as view form, view related task, and add relationship
questions.correctAnswer: B. It displays actions related to filtering options,assigning tags, and search

questions.text: When using the Load Data and Transform Map process, what is the Mapping Assist used for?
options: A. Mapping fields using the Import Log
B. Mapping fields using Transform History
C. Mapping fields using an SLA
D. Mapping fields using a Field Map
questions.correctAnswer: D. Mapping fields using a Field Map

questions.text: Which one of the following statements describes the contents of the Configuration Management Database (CMDB)?
options: A. The CMDB contains data about tangible and intangible business assets
B. The CMDB contains the Business Rules that direct the intangible, configurable assets used by a company
C. The CMDB archives all Service Management PaaS equipment metadata and usage statistics
D. The CMDB contains ITIL process data pertaining to configuration items
questions.correctAnswer: A. The CMDB contains data about tangible and intangible business assets

questions.text: In what order should filter elements be specified?
Which type of tables may be extended by other tables, but do not extend another table?
Which of the following statement describes the purpose of an Order Guide?
options: A. Order Guides restrict the number of items in an order to only one item per request
B. Order Guides provide a list of guidelines for Administrators on how to set up item variables
C. Order Guide provide the ability to order multiple, related items as one request
D. Order Guides take the user directly to the checkout without prompting for information
questions.correctAnswer: C. Order Guide provide the ability to order multiple, related items as one request

questions.text: Which tool is used to have conversations with logged-in users in real-time?
Which technique is used to get information from a series of referenced fields from different tables?
Which of the following can be customized through the Basic Configuration UI 16 module? (Choose three.)
options: A. A schema map enables administrators to define records from specific tables as trouble sources for Configuration Items
B. A schema map graphically organizes the CMDB
C. A schema map graphically displays the Configuration Items that support a business service
D. A schema map displays the details of tables and their relationships in a visual manner, allowing administrators to view and easily access different parts of the database schema
questions.correctAnswer: D. A schema map displays the details of tables and their relationships in a visual manner, allowing administrators to view and easily access different parts of the database schema

questions.text: Which one of the following statements best describes the purpose of an Update Set?
options: A. An Update Set allows administrators to group a series of changes into a named set and then move this set as a unit to other systems
B. By default, an Update Set includes customizations, Business Rules, and homepages
C. An Update Set is a group applied
D. By default, the changes included in an Update Set are visible only in the instance to which they are applied
questions.correctAnswer: A. An Update Set allows administrators to group a series of changes into a named set and then move this set as a unit to other systems

questions.text: Which statement is true about business rules?
options: A. A business rule must run before a database action occurs
B. A business rule can be a piece of JavaScript
C. A business rule must not run before a database action occurs
D. A business rule monitors fields on a form
questions.correctAnswer: B. A business rule can be a piece of JavaScript

questions.text: What is the function of user impersonation?
What information does the System Dictionary contain?
options: A. The human-readable labels and language settings
B. The definition for each table and column
C. The information on how tables relate to each other
D. The language dictionary used for spell checking
questions.correctAnswer: B. The definition for each table and column

questions.text: What do Insert and Update buttons do on a form?
options: A. Insert creates a new record and Update saves changes to an existing record
B. Insert creates a new record and Update saves the form and stays on the same record
C. Insert saves changes and exits the form, Update saves changes and stays on the form
questions.correctAnswer: A. Insert creates a new record and Update saves changes to an existing record
questions.note: Question text and options were partially visible in the screenshot. The provided answer is based on standard ServiceNow functionality.

questions.text: How is the Event Log different from the Event Registry?
options: A. Event Log contains generated Events, the Event Registry is a table of Event definitions
B. Event Log is formatted in the Log style, the Event Registry displays different fields
C. Event Log lists Events that were triggered by integrations, the Event Registry lists the Events that were triggered during the day (24-hour period)
D. Event Log is the same as the Event Registry
questions.correctAnswer: A. Event Log contains generated Events, the Event Registry is a table of Event definitions

questions.text: What is a Dictionary Override?
options: A. A Dictionary Override is an incoming customer update in an Update Set which applies to the same objects as a newer local customer update
B. A Dictionary Override is the addition, modification, or removal of anything that could have an effect on IT services
C. A Dictionary Override is a task within a flow that requests an action before the flow can continue
D. A Dictionary Override sets field properties in extended tables
questions.correctAnswer: D. A Dictionary Override sets field properties in extended tables

questions.text: Which group of permissions is used to control Application and Module access?
What is a Record Producer?
options: A. A Record Producer creates user records
B. A Record Producer is a type of Catalog Item that provides easy ordering by bundling requests
C. A Record Producer is a type of Catalog Item that is used for Requests, not Services
D. A Record Producer is a type of Catalog Item that allows users to create task-based records from the Service Catalog
questions.correctAnswer: D. A Record Producer is a type of Catalog Item that allows users to create task-based records from the Service Catalog

questions.text: Create Incident, Password Reset, and Report outage: what do these services in the Service Catalog have in common?
options: A. They direct the user to a record producer
B. They direct the user to a catalog property
C. They direct the user to a catalog UI policy
D. They direct the user to a catalog client script
questions.correctAnswer: A. They direct the user to a record producer

questions.text: What is the Import Set Table?
options: A. A table where data will be placed, post-transformation
B. A table that determines relationships
C. A staging area for imported records
D. A repository for Update Set information
questions.correctAnswer: C. A staging area for imported records

questions.text: What is a characteristic of importing data into ServiceNow?
options: A. An existing Transform Map can be used only one time on the same import set
B. Coalesce fields are used after running Transform
C. Any user can manage and set up import sets
D. An existing Transform Map can be used multiple times on the same import set
questions.correctAnswer: D. An existing Transform Map can be used multiple times on the same import set

questions.text: What module in the Service Catalog application does an Administrator access to begin creating a new item?
Which of the following allows a user to edit fields in a list without opening the form?
Which three Variable Types can be added to a Service Catalog Item?
options: A. True/False, Multiple Choice, and Ordered List
B. True/False, Checkbox and Number List
C. Number List, Single Line Text, and Reference
D. Multiple Choice, Select Box, and Checkbox
questions.correctAnswer: D. Multiple Choice, Select Box, and Checkbox

questions.text: How are Workflows moved between instances?
options: A. Workflows are moved using Update Sets
B. Workflows are moved using Transform Maps
C. Workflows are moved using Application Sets
D. Workflows cannot be moved between instances
questions.correctAnswer: A. Workflows are moved using Update Sets

questions.text: The baseline Service Catalog homepage contains links to which of the following components?
options: A. Record Producers, Order Guides, and Catalog Items
B. Order Guides, Item Variables, and flows
C. Order Guides, Catalog Items, and flows
D. Record Producers, Order Guides, and Item Variables
questions.correctAnswer: A. Record Producers, Order Guides, and Catalog Items

questions.text: Which of the following statements is true when a new table is created by extending another table?
options: A. The new table inherits all of the Business Rules, Client Scripts, and UI Policies of the parent table, but none of the existing fields
B. The new table archive parent table and assumed its roles in the database
C. The new table inherits all of the fields of the parent table and can also contain new fields unique to itself
D. The new table inherits all of the fields, but does not inherit Access Control rules, Client Scripts, and UI Policies of the parent table
questions.correctAnswer: C. The new table inherits all of the fields of the parent table and can also contain new fields unique to itself

questions.text: Where can Admins check which release is running on a ServiceNow instance?
A knowledge article must be which of the following states to display to a user?
What is the name of the conversational bot platform that provides assistance to help users obtain information, make decisions, and perform common tasks?
What is the purpose of a Related List?
options: A. To create a one-to-many relationship
B. To dot-walk to a core table

questions.text: Which one of the following statements describes the purpose of a Service Catalog flow?
options: A. A Service Catalog flow generates three basic components: item variable types, tasks, and approvals
B. Although a Service Catalog flow cannot send notifications, the flow drives complex fulfillment processes
C. A Service Catalog flow is used to drive complex fulfillment processes and sends notifications to defined users or groups
D. A Service Catalog flow generates three basic components: item variable types, tasks, and notifications
questions.correctAnswer: C. A Service Catalog flow is used to drive complex fulfillment processes and sends notifications to defined users or groups

questions.text: Which section of the ServiceNow UI allows you to perform a global search?
How do you make a list filter available to everyone?
options: A. Make active, assign a name, and save
B. Assign a group, set visibility, and save
C. Assign a name, set visibility, and save
D. Make active, set visibility, and save
questions.correctAnswer: C. Assign a name, set visibility, and save

questions.text: What would NOT appear in the Application Navigator if 'service' is typed into the filter field?
Which of the following is used to categorize, flag, and locate records?
Which tool should be used to populate commonly used fields in a form?
How is a group defined in ServiceNow?
options: A. A group is one record stored in the Group Type [sys_user_group_type] table
B. A group is one record stored in the Group [sys_user_group] table
C. A group defines a set of users that share the same location
D. A group defines a set of users that share the same job title
questions.correctAnswer: B. A group is one record stored in the Group [sys_user_group] table

questions.text: What is a role in ServiceNow?
options: A. A role is one record in the [user_sys_role] table
B. A role is a set of modules for a particular application
C. A role is one record in the Role [sys_user_role] table
D. A role is a persona used in Live Feed Chat
questions.correctAnswer: B. A role is a set of modules for a particular application

questions.text: What is a Notification?
options: A. A tool for alerting users that events that concern them have occurred
B. A message through Connect related to a Change Request
C. A new Knowledge article created by Business Rule
questions.correctAnswer: A. A tool for alerting users that events that concern them have occurred

questions.text: Which one of the following is NOT a type of Visual Task Board?
Which term best describes something that is created, has work performed upon it, and is eventually moved to a state of closed?
Which core table in the ServiceNow platform provides a series of standard fields used on each of the tables that extend it, such as the Incident [incident] and Problem [problem] tables?
Which of the following statements describes how data is organized in a table?
options: A. A column is a field in the database and a record is one user
B. A column is one field and a record is one row
C. A column is one field and a record is one column
D. A column contains data from one user and a record is one set of fields
questions.correctAnswer: B. A column is one field and a record is one row

questions.text: What is a sys_id?
options: A. Unique 32-character identifier that is assigned to every record
D. Unique 64-character identifier that is assigned to every record
questions.correctAnswer: A. Unique 32-character identifier that is assigned to every record

questions.text: When creating a global custom table named 'abc', what is the table name that is automatically assigned by the platform?
Access Control rules may provide access security for which of the following database objects?
options: A. For a specific row, column, or table
B. For a specific row, group, or user
D. For a specific CMDB Configuration item
questions.correctAnswer: B. For a specific row, group, or user

questions.text: What is the primary application used to load data into ServiceNow?
Which of the following steps can be used to import new data?
options: A. Select Data Source, Load Data, Create Transform Map, Run
B. Configuration, Load Data, Create Transform Map, Run
C. Define Data Source, Select Transform Map, Run
D. Select Import Set, Select Transform Map, Run
questions.correctAnswer: B. Configuration, Load Data, Create Transform Map, Run

questions.text: Which of the following steps can be used to import new data into ServiceNow from a spreadsheet?
options: A. Select Data Source, Schedule Transform
B. Load Data, Create Transform Map, Run Transform
C. Define Data Source, Select Transform Map, Run Transform
D. Select Import Set, Select Transform Map, Run Transform
questions.correctAnswer: B. Load Data, Create Transform Map, Run Transform

questions.text: Which tool is used for creating dependencies between configuration items in the CMDB?
What is the difference between a UI Policy and Data Policy?
options: A. Data Policies run when data is entered through the form, by an Import Set, or by web services; while UI Policies are set only by web services
B. Data Policies can be converted into UI Policies, but UI Policies cannot be converted into Data Policies
C. Data Policies run regardless of how data is entered into ServiceNow, while UI Policies are used for form interactions
D. Data Policies run only after UI Policies run successfully
questions.correctAnswer: C. Data Policies run regardless of how data is entered into ServiceNow, while UI Policies are used for form interactions

questions.text: Which one of the following is an accurate list of changes that are captured in an Update Set?
options: A. Changes made to: tables, forms, Business Rules, and data records
B. Changes made to: tables, forms, groups, and configuration items (CIs)
C. Changes made to: tables, forms, views, and fields
D. Changes made to: tables, forms, schedules, and client scripts
questions.correctAnswer: D. Changes made to: table, forms, views, and fields

questions.text: What are the steps to retrieve an Update Set?
options: A. Verify Update Set is Complete, Retrieve, Preview, Apply
B. Verify Update Set is Complete, Test Connection, Apply
C. Verify Update Set is Complete, Test Connection, Commit
D. Verify Update Set is Complete, Retrieve, Preview, Commit
questions.correctAnswer: D. Verify Update Set is Complete, Retrieve, Preview, Commit

questions.text: IntegrationHub enables execution of third-party APIs as a part of a flow. These integrations are referred to as
Which one statement correctly describes Access Control rule evaluation?
options: A. Table access rules are evaluated from the general to the specific
B. If more than one rule applies to a record, the older rule is evaluated first
C. If a row-level rule and a field-level rule exist, both rules must be true before an operation is allowed
D. The role with the most permissions evaluates the rules first
questions.correctAnswer: C. If a row-level rule and a field-level rule exist, both rules must be true before an operation is allowed

questions.text: Which of the following protects applications by identifying and restricting access to available files and data?
Why is it recommended that you limit update sets to a maximum of 100 records?
options: A. Comply with ISO audit requirements
B. Smaller update sets can be imported to production during business hours
D. Improve ability to troubleshoot issues with the default update set
E. Make it easier to identify and review changes
F. Keeps update set logs shorter
correctAnswer: B. Smaller update sets can be imported to production during business hours
E. Make it easier to identify and review changes

questions.text: What attributes you can manage using system properties > basic configuration UI16?
A new employee joins the IT department and needs to perform work assigned to network and hardware groups. How would you set up their access? (choose three)
options: A. add user account to hardware group
B. Add user acount to ACL
D. add user account to IT knowledge base
E. add user account to network group
F. add user account to itil group
correctAnswer: A. add user account to hardware group
E. add user account to network group

questions.text: When using context menu on list, form, and column headings, what are the quick way to access the menus? (choose two)
options: B. click on context menu icon
C. shift-click on the list, form, or column heading
D. right-click on the list, form, or column heading
E. double click on the list, form, or column heading
correctAnswer: B. click on context menu icon
C. shift-click on the list, form, or column heading

questions.text: Tables can be characterised in multiple ways, which of this combination is impossible?
What are advantages of using Flow Designer? (choose three)
options: F. smooth integration with third-party systems
correctAnswer: F. smooth integration with third-party systems

questions.text: What are the different types of data sources, which may be imported into ServiceNow? (choose four)
options: F. local sources (i.e., XML, CSV, excel)
correctAnswer: F. local sources (i.e., XML, CSV, excel)

questions.text: What are the examples of UI actions relating to forms? (choose three)
What are the main components of the form design interface? (choose three)
When a custom table is created, which access control rules are automatically created? (choose four)
What type of entities can receive task assignments, in ServiceNow? (choose two)
Which would you follow when testing a catalogue item that has a manager approval flow? (choose three)
options: A. make sure the latest flows are activated
B. use the instance Incognito setting to quickly toggle between requester and approver
C. use your admin account, so you can approve the items quickly
D. impersonate the requester to ensure the form works
E. make sure the requester's user record as specified manager
F. create and select your testing update set before starting the test cases
correctAnswer: C. use your admin account, so you can approve the items quickly
D. impersonate the requester to ensure the form works
E. make sure the requester's user record as specified manager

questions.text: When selecting the target table for an import, which table can you select? (choose three)
options: C. tables within the existing application scope
D. tables within the global scope
E. tables which allow write access to other applications
correctAnswer: C. tables within the existing application scope
D. tables within the global scope
E. tables which allow write access to other applications

questions.text: What are three security modules often used by the System Administrator? (choose three)
options: C. system security > high security settings
correctAnswer: C. system security > high security settings

questions.text: When managing tags, you can adjust who is able to see it. What are the visibility options? (choose three)
Which modules can you use to create a new table? (choose two)
What are examples of UI Actions, relating to lists? (choose two)
While showing a customer their incident form, they ask to change the priority field title to display their internal terminology 'Pvalue'. How would you do that? (choose two)
options: A. right click on priority and select configure label
B. right click on priority and select configure display settings
C. right click on priority and select configure dictionary
D. right click on priority and select configure column
correctAnswer: A. right click on priority and select configure label
C. right click on priority and select configure dictionary

questions.text: An IT User calls the service desk because they need to work on task records. All they can see is their self-service on their homepage when they log into the service-now instance. What issue could explain this? (choose two)
options: A. their user account does not belong to any group which contains the ITIL role
B. their user record was not approved by their managers
C. their user account is not logged in properly
D. their user account does not have itil role
correctAnswer: A. their user account does not belong to any group which contains the ITIL role
D. their user account does not have itil role

questions.text: Reports can be created from which different places in the platform? (choose two)
Knowledge Base Search results can be sorted by which of the following? (choose three)
options: F. Smooth integration with 3rd party systems

questions.text: What is the path an Administrator could take to view the fulfillment stage task list for an order placed by a user? (choose four)
Which ServiceNow products can be used to discover and populate the CMDB? (choose four)
Which of the following are a type of client scripts supported in ServiceNow? (choose four)
Which of the following concepts are associated with the ServiceNow CMDB? (choose four)
What is a formatter? Select one of the following.
options: A. A formatter allows you to configure applications for an instance
B. A formatter is a form element used to display information that is not a field in the record
C. A formatter allows you to populate fields automatically
D. A formatter is a set of conditions applied to a table to help find and work with data
questions.correctAnswer: B. A formatter is a form element used to display information that is not a field in the record

questions.text: When searching using the App Navigator search field, what can be returned? (choose four)
options: A. Names of Applications and Modules
correctAnswer: A. Names of Applications and Modules

questions.text: Which of the following can be customized through the Basic Configuration UI 16 module? (choose three)
Which are valid ServiceNow User Authentication Methods? (choose three)
Access Control rules may be defined with which of the following permission requirements? (choose three)
What is (are) best practice(s) regarding user/groups/roles? (choose two)
options: A. You should never assign roles to groups
B. You should add users to groups
C. You should assign roles to groups
D. You should assign roles directly to users
correctAnswer: B. You should add users to groups
C. You should assign roles to groups

questions.text: What are two ways to generate an Event? (choose two)
The ServiceNow platform includes which types of interfaces? (choose three)
Which of the following are not included in an Update Set, by default? (choose four)
